<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_inmis_im_itad_box_label_order</collection><condition>gs.getSession().isInteractive()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>add info message on Box lable order</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
        var uri = gs.action.getGlideURI().toString();
        var index = gs.action.getGlideURI().toString().indexOf('addinfomessage');

        if (typeof uri != "undefined" && index != -1) {
            gs.addInfoMessage('Please use global Locations table to create new Locations. ITAD location details can be mapped to newly created location through this module');

        }
    } catch (e) {
       // gs.info('>>>Exception occured: ' + e);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Ruthvic.voladri@ness.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-11 11:16:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>85e15a0fdba1601067166ac2ca961995</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>add info message on Box lable order</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition" source="x_inmis_im_itad">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Ingram Micro IT Asset Disposition">df95bbf0dbc17f008a521fe968961950</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_85e15a0fdba1601067166ac2ca961995</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Ruthvic.voladri@ness.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-11 11:22:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=85e15a0fdba1601067166ac2ca961995"/></record_update>
